alert.note: Alert for Hinds; Warren (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 08 at 8:55PM CST until March 10 at 2:00AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson MS has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Mississippi... Big Black River Near Bovina affecting Warren and Hinds Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Black River Near Bovina. * WHEN...Until late Wednesday night. * IMPACTS...At 28.0 feet, Low-lying agricultural land near the river begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 PM CST Tuesday the stage was 27.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 28.5 feet just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 28.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Big Black River Bovina 28.0 27.6 Tue 8 pm CST 27.1 25.8 25.8 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Wednesday morning at 900 AM CST.
